description: DrexelOne for mobile devices provides the students, faculty, and staff of Drexel University with access to personal information, such as class schedules, upcoming course assignments (in Bb Vista), the mid-term grade book for each scheduled course (also only for courses in Bb Vista), final grades and GPA information, and funds available on the DragonCard, Drexel’s ID and purchasing card. Members of the Drexel community and the general public can read Drexel’s Daily Digest of news and events and view the latest headlines from The Triangle, Drexel’s student newspaper. The Athletics section of DrexelOne provides news, scores, and upcoming events. People wanting to eat can find out what’s on the menu at the Handshumacher Dining Center; for more choices, check out the list of merchants that accept the DragonCard for payment. A campus map lets you know where everything is and if you need a ride someplace, you can find out when the next shuttle bus is arriving and get the full schedules of all shuttle routes. With time to spare you can view the recent archives of Candid Campus photos and Candid Question surveys, including student comments on each.
